title.en: A Prayer to the Eighty-Four Mahāsiddhas

text.en: Homage to glorious Vajrasattva!
text.en-trans: pal dorjé sempa la chaktsal lo

text.en: You are the sovereign pervading all things animate and inanimate,
text.en-trans: tenyö ngöpo kün la khyabpé dak

text.en: The universally supreme state of great-bliss unity—
All-pervading lord, Vajradhara, I pray to you!
text.en-trans: khyabdak dorjé chang la solwa deb

text.en: Vidyādharas who’ve reached accomplishment,
As numerous as the atoms of the ocean,
text.en-trans: zhing dul gyatsö drang dang nyampa la

text.en: Unfathomable to ordinary beings,
text.en-trans: sokyé lo yi tsönpar nü min kyang

text.en: In devotion to you, the eighty-four mighty yogins
text.en-trans: kyilkhor khorlö tsok kyi duwa ru

text.en: Assembled here in this maṇḍala gathering,
By recalling your liberating life-examples, I pay homage to you!
Thought-free eater of fish, Lūyipa;
Innately mindful one, Līlapa;
Master of yogic practices, Virūpa;
Self-arisen vajra form, Ḍombipa;
Slayer of the deer of thinking, Śavaripa;
text.en-trans: namtok ri gé sepé shawa ri

text.en: Lords of Khecharī, I pray to you all!
text.en-trans: khachö wangpo nam la solwa deb

text.en: Attainer of the supreme siddhi, Saraha;
Actualizer of vajra non-self, Kaṅkāripa;
Master of the highest mundane siddhis, Gorakṣapa;
Attainer of the siddhi of immortality, Caurāṅgipa;
text.en-trans: chimé ngödrub nyepé tsé ring ga

text.en: Realizer of the ultimate through the sound of a lute, Vīṇāpa—
text.en-trans: piwam dra ledön tok wi napa

text.en: Chiefs of all siddhas, I pray to you all!
text.en-trans: drub nyé tsowo nam la solwa deb

text.en: Attainer of the supreme siddhi, Śāntipa;
Your body as youthful as a sixteen-year-old, Tantipa;
Realizer of the spontaneous dharmakāya, Cāmāripa;
text.en-trans: lhündrub chökü dön tok tsa ma ri

text.en: Master of the sword of primordial wisdom, Khaḍgapa;
Foretold by the victors, noble Nāgārjuna—
Mighty vajradharas, I pray to you all!
text.en-trans: dorjé chang wang nam la solwa deb

text.en: Chief of siddhas, venerable Kṛṣṇācārya;
Chief of scholars and siddhas, Āryadeva;
text.en-trans: khé shing drubpé tsowo pakpa lha

text.en: Realizer of the absence of arising and ceasing, Thaganapa;
Attainer of the supreme siddhi by means of hardship, Nāropa;
Naturally liberated, fearless Śalipa—
Masters of conduct, I pray to you all!
text.en-trans: chö chang wangpo nam la solwa deb

text.en: Binder of cakras,1glorious Tilopa;
Mighty yogi, glorious Cattrapa;
Realizer of emptiness, venerable yogi Bhadrapa;
text.en-trans: tongnyi dön tok naljor batré zhab

text.en: Deity, mantra, and dharmakāya inseparable, Dukhaṅdi;
text.en-trans: lha ngak chö sum yermé dhukhen dhi

text.en: Attainer of the supreme through the path of the second empowerment, Ajogipa—
text.en-trans: teng gö lam lé chok nyen adzoki

text.en: Mighty yogis, I pray to you all!
text.en-trans: naljor wangchuk nam la solwa deb

text.en: Intoxicated by realizing the definitive meaning, Kālapa;
Cleanser of impurity’s stains, Dhobīpa;
Free from attachment to sensory pleasures, Kaṅkaṇa;
Realizer of appearance and existence as illusions, Kambala;
Cakrasaṃvara by nature, Ḍeṅgipa—
Lords of accomplishment, I pray to you all!
text.en-trans: drubpé wangpo nam la solwa deb

text.en: Attainer of the supreme mahāmudrā, Śāntipa;
Realizer of the unreality of all things, Taṅtepa,
Attainer of the supreme siddhi, glorious Kukkurīpa;
Master of Guhyasamāja, Kucipa;
Realizer of multiplicity as one taste, Dharmapa—
Herukas, I pray to you all!
text.en-trans: heruka pa nam la solwa deb

text.en: Realizer of the lack of perceiver, perception, and perceived, Mahipa;
Holder of an inexhaustible treasure of desirables, Aciṅtapa;
Bodhicitta, the nature of deathless nectar, Babhahi;
Purifier of the stains of impure delusion, Nalina;
text.en-trans: ma dak trüpé dri jang nalina

text.en: Crown ornament of scholars, glorious Śāntideva—
Sovereigns of siddhis, I pray to you all!
text.en-trans: khorlö gyurwa nam la solwa deb

text.en: Chief of siddhas, venerable Indrabhūti;
Realizer of the unchanging natural state, Mekopa;
Traverser of the path of innate great bliss, Koṭālipa;
Master of the avadhūtī, venerable Kaṁparipa;
Attainer of the siddhi of unity, Jālandhara—
Mighty lords of siddhis, I pray to you all!
text.en-trans: khorlö wangchuk nam la solwa deb

text.en: You whose prāṇa and mind entered the central channel, Rāhula;
You who manifested the wisdom of realization, Dharmapa;
Indivisibility of basic space and awareness, Guru Dhokaripa;
Ripener of the wondrous fruition of the two kāyas, Medinī;
text.en-trans: ku nyi dré zang minpé medhini

text.en: Embraced by the noble ones, Guru Paṅkaja;
Vajra holders, I pray to you all!
Attainer of the supreme siddhi, glorious Ghaṇṭāpa;
Hevajra in person, Guru Jogipa;
Attainer of the supreme mahāmudrā, Celuki;
Realizer of emptiness and sound inseparable, Godhuri;
Attainer of the supreme siddhi through the two-stage path, Luñcaka—
text.en-trans: rim nyi lam lé chok nyé litsika

text.en: Kings of siddhas, I pray to you all!
text.en-trans: drubpé khyuchok nam la solwa deb

text.en: Realizer of the luminous unity, Naguṇa;
Conqueror of the enemy, dualism, venerable Jayānanda;
Realizer of indivisible emptiness, Pacari;
Manifester of the great-bliss fruition, Campaka;
Obtainer of the state of unity, Bhikṣana—
Masters of supreme siddhi, I pray to you all!
text.en-trans: drub chokwang po nam la solwa deb

text.en: Filled with undefiled bliss, Medhili;
Purifier of delusion’s stains, Guru Kumbhakāripa;
Extracter of the vajra great-bliss essence, Cārpaṭi;
Realizer of conditioning’s meaning, venerable Maṇibhadrā;
Embodying the symbols of simplicity, Mekhalā—
text.en-trans: trömé da yi rang zuk likhali

text.en: Vajra holders, I pray to you all!
text.en-trans: dorjé chang wang nam la solwa deb

text.en: Unity of basic space and awareness, venerable Kanakhalā;
Appearances of objects self-liberated, Kalakala;
Realizer of the unreality of all things, Kaṇtāli;
Appearances and mind inseparable, Dahuli;
Accomplisher of the supreme siddhi of Guhyasamāja, Udhili—
Accomplished victorious ones, I pray to you all!
text.en-trans: drub nyé gyalwa nam la solwa deb

text.en: Magnificent joy, glorious Kapālapa;
Thoughts liberated in their natural place, Kirapāla;
Mighty lake-born one, Guru Sakara;
Unity of appearance and emptiness, venerable Sarvabhakṣa;
Self-liberator of clinging to reality, Nāgabodhi—
Supreme masters, I pray to you all!
text.en-trans: chok gi lobpön nam la solwa deb

text.en: Attainer of the supreme siddhi, venerable Dārika;
text.en-trans: ngödrub chok nyé dhari kapé zhab

text.en: Perfecter of the two-stage path, Guru Puttali;
text.en-trans: rim nyi lam gom guru pu ta li

text.en: Purifier of the discards of the path of seeing, glorious Upanaha;
text.en-trans: tong pang dri dak palden sanaha

text.en: Self-liberated yogi, Kokilapa;
The six sense doors self-liberated, Guru Anaṅga—
Siddhas of unity, I pray to you all!
text.en-trans: zungjuk drubpa nam la solwa deb

text.en: Vajra queen, Lakṣmīṅkarā;
text.en-trans: dorjé tsünmo la lu ma kara

text.en: Realizer of the four joys, Guru Samudra;
text.en-trans: ga zhi dön tok guru samuda

text.en: Extracter of the vajra great-bliss essence, Vyālipa—
Mighty Ones of Khecarī, I pray to you all!
text.en-trans: khachö wangchuk nam la solwa deb

text.en: By the power and grace of praying in this way,
text.en-trans: detar solwa tabpé tu jin gyi

text.en: May I, in all my lives, be taken in and embraced
text.en-trans: kyewa küntu drub nyé rigpa dzin

text.en: By the accomplished vidyādharas and the vajra queens,
And, through the two-stage path, in this very life
text.en-trans: rim nyi lam lé chok gi ngödrub ni

text.en: May I accomplish the supreme siddhi without difficulty!
text.en-trans: kawa mepar tsé dir drub gyur chik
